emuInput.TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mrs. Arthur Coles wearing sheer mid length veil with floral edge and long sleeved wedding gown with floral lace overlay, holding large bouquet of roses, standing in interior with building patterned curtains, possibly at 335 Brushton Avenue, Homewood
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 21, 1951, pg. 8 reads: "In The Bridal March - Radiant smiles are registered on the faces of theses lovely ladies who are summer brides...Mrs. Arthur Coles...Mrs. Coles' picture is a Harris photo."
